Sentence.value: Hypertensive heart disease refers to heart problems that occur because of high blood pressure.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Hypertensive heart disease refers to [[heart problems|C0795691]] that occur because of [[high blood pressure|C0020538]].

Sentence.value: High blood pressure also leads to thickening of the blood vessel walls.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: [[High blood pressure|C0020538]] also leads to [[thickening|C0205400]] of the blood vessel walls.

Sentence.value: When combined with cholesterol deposits in the blood vessels, the risk of heart attack and stroke increases.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: When combined with [[cholesterol|C0008377]] deposits in the [[blood vessels|C0005847]], the risk of heart attack and stroke increases.

Sentence.value: Call your health care provider if you have high blood pressure and develop any symptoms.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Call your [[health care provider|C0018724]] if you have [[high blood pressure|C0020538]] and develop any symptoms.
